answers.answer: I'm so very sorry about your daughter.  Is she at a hospital which deals with this type of emergency?  I really don't understand how they could give her a slim chance with diabetes and Hep B.Does she currently have decompensated cirrhosis?....Kim

Again I'm truly sorry that you are going thru this.  Has she shown any improvement or stability since becoming hospitalized?  My thought to you would be, Do you trust the team of Drs that are caring for your daughter?It's important to know that they are doing everything they can to help herget better.I'm also a mom and have a daughter whom I adore and can understand the heartache you must be going thru.  If there is any way that I can help you please don't hesitate to ask.  It's so very sad to see our children not doing well.  Am so hoping she turns a corner and that you begin to see improvement.Warm Wishes to you both......Kim
Thank you so much. You are a very sweet person.
